pageProduct.name: Avene Cleansing Foam 150ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Cleansing foam for normal to combination sensitive skin.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. In case of contact with the eyes, rinse with water.

Common Uses

Gentle cleansing foam which removes impurities and make-up from face, eyes and lips, eliminates excess sebum, moisturizes and restores skin's suppleness. Soap-free, alcohol-free, paraben-free.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA). WATER (AQUA). SODIUM LAUROYL METHYL ISETHIONATE. ZINC COCETH SULFATE. POLYSORBATE 20. SODIUM COCOAMPHOACETATE. CETEARETH-60 MYRISTYL GLYCOL. PEG-40 HYDROGENATED CASTOR OIL. CITRIC ACID. DISODIUM EDTA. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). GLYCERYL LAURATE. GREEN 5 (CI 61570). SODIUM BENZOATE. SODIUM HYDROXIDE. YELLOW 5 (CI 19140). ZINC GLUCONATE.

Directions

Apply morning and/or evening on wet or dry skin. Massage with fingertips and rince thoroughly. Gently pat dry. Follow with a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water and your daily moisturizer.
